title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2053.16 - Annual reports
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2053.16 - Annual reports

State Regulations
(a) On or
before the first day of September of each year, the corporation shall submit to
the committee a report covering the preceding year. The report shall include, with respect to requests for access to records and with respect to requests for
correction or amendment of records pursuant to these regulations, respectively, the following information: (1)
the number of
determinations made to grant such requests; and
(2)
the number of determinations made to deny
such requests in whole or in part, respectively. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2053.16

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
